GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing a single article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increase or decrease the votes on a particular article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment on a particular article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array of comments made on a particular article
